com.groundcontrol.game.view.ScreenModules

Interface Section

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConnectClientSection, ConnectServerSection, GameOverFirstSection, GameOverSecondSection, GameOverSection, GameSection, LostConnectionSection, MenuSection, MultiplayerClientSection, MultiplayerSectionSelector, MultiplayerServerSection, PauseFirstSection, PauseSecondSection, PauseSection

    public interface Section
    Interface used to define the several sections of our game, during it's life cycle

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage createStage()
      Creates the needed stage to hold all elements in a section
      void display(float delta)
      Display all the section elements
      void drawBackground()
      Draws the background of the section
      void drawStages(float delta)
      Draws all the stages created for the section
      void transition()
      Makes a transition to a new section, clearing every not needed element
      void update(float delta)
      Updates all the section elements in each step

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(float delta)
        Updates all the section elements in each step
        Parameters:
        delta - the time elapsed after the last step

        Display all the section elements
